headline.main: The Decisive Battle'; Force of German Effort Is Offset by Russian Tenacity and Weather

lead_paragraph: Snow was falling along a large part of the Russian front yesterday as what Adolf Hitler described as "the last great decisive battle of this year" opened its second week.
abstract: H W Baldwin on the decisive battle; USSR children and downed German plane illus
